Welcome to DynaSim's documentation!
===================================

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

Apparently need to reference everything to a "module" for the autodocumentation to work.

Let's look at a link to :func:`dynasim.AnalyzeData` since it's a good function. It works! Links need to be indicated by their module!

^^^
